symptomAnalyzerDescription: Describe your symptoms, and our AI will provide informational suggestions for over-the-counter medicines and a possible medical specialty to consult. This is not medical advice.
symptomsPlaceholder: e.g., I have a runny nose, mild cough, and a slight headache for two days.
analysisResultsDescription: Based on the symptoms you provided, here are some informational suggestions. Remember to consult a healthcare professional.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyInfo: For symptoms like these, you might consider consulting a: {specialty}.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyDisclaimer: This is an AI-generated suggestion and not a diagnosis. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider.
suggestedMedicinesInfo: The following are general suggestions and not medical advice. Always read labels and consult a healthcare professional.
noMedicineSuggestionsInfo: The AI could not provide specific over-the-counter medicine suggestions based on the input. This could be due to the nature of the symptoms or if they require professional medical attention. Please consult a doctor.
validationMaxChars: Please enter no more than {count} characters.
validationFailedMessage: Please correct the errors in the form.
errorDuringAnalysisMessage: An error occurred during symptom analysis.
footerDisclaimer: This tool provides AI-generated information for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.
locationPlaceholderPharmacies: Enter city or zip for pharmacies...
locationPlaceholderDoctors: Enter city or zip for doctors...
locationPlaceholderPathology: Enter city or zip for labs...
locationPlaceholderHospitals: Enter city or zip for hospitals...
noDataGenerated: AI could not generate {entity} examples for the specified location{specialtyString}. Please try a different location or broaden your search.
validationLocationMinChars: Location must be at least {count} characters.
validationLocationMaxChars: Location can be at most {count} characters.
validationSpecialtyMaxChars: Specialty can be at most {count} characters.
errorDuringSearchMessage: An error occurred while searching for {entity_plural}.
adminInvalidCredentials: Invalid username or password. Please try again.
adminLoginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
blogDescription: Your source for health insights, tips, and news.
noBlogPosts: No blog posts available yet. Check back soon!
createPostDescription: Fill out the form below to publish a new article.
blogPostCreationError: An error occurred while creating the blog post.
